title: Chat Recap Platforms
description: Explore your messaging patterns across different platforms. Get your chatrecap insights into your chat habits, active hours, and most engaging conversations.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Analyze your WhatsApp conversations to understand your messaging patterns and relationship dynamics.
whatsapp.download_guide: How to import your chat from whatsapp

instagram.title: Instagram
instagram.description: Discover insights from your Instagram direct messages and understand your communication style.
instagram.download_guide: How to import your chat from Instagram
instagram.guide_description: Export Steps: Settings > Accounts Center > Your information and permissions > Download or transfer information. Note: After requesting your data, Instagram will email you a download link within 48 hours. The chat history will be in JSON format.

snapchat.title: Snapchat Chat
snapchat.description: Analyze your Snapchat conversations to understand your communication style and patterns.
snapchat.download_guide: How to import your chat from Snapchat
snapchat.guide_description: Go to Settings → My Data/Select 'Export JSON Files' for data portability purposes/Make sure 'Chat History' is selected/Submit your request and wait for the email/Download the ZIP file and extract it/Find the 'chat_history.json' file in the extracted folder/Upload this JSON file below

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.description: Get insights from your Telegram conversations and understand your messaging patterns.
telegram.download_guide: How to import your chat from Telegram
telegram.guide_description: Export Steps: 1. Open Telegram Desktop app 2. Go to Chat → Export Chat History 3. Export with no media in JSON format Note: Please ensure you have the latest version of Telegram Desktop installed. The export feature is only available in the desktop application.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Analyze your Discord chats to better understand your communication in gaming and community contexts.
discord.download_guide: How to import your chat from Discord
discord.guide_description: Export Steps: 1. Download and install Discord Chat Exporter 2. Get your Discord token 3. Export chat history to JSON format. Note: Using third-party tools like Discord Chat Exporter may violate Discord's Terms of Service. Please use at your own risk.

chatrecapplatform.description: Select the platform you want to analyze your chat history from. We support multiple messaging platforms to provide comprehensive insights.

meta.description: Select the platform you want to analyze your chat from
meta.title: Choose Your Chat Platform
